polispathiwaraya wisin laba di athi niyoga saha aayathana sangrahaye niyoga kada karamin padawiya polisiye sthanadhipathiwaraya wisin ema polis sthanaye danata sewaye niyuthu niladharin 109 denakugen rupiyal 500 bagin mudal ekathu kala bawa padawiya polis sthanaye niladharihu pawasathi.kisidu katayuththak sadaha niladharingen mudal ekathu kirima nokarana lesata polispathiwaraya wisin niyoga laba di athath pasugiya 05 wanida padawiya polisiye ardha warshika parikshanaya sandaha godanangille thintha aalepa kirimata bawa pawasamin polis sthanadhipathiwaraya mese mudal ekathu kala bawa niladharihu pawasathi.
